Articles.Content:
As some people know there used to be two good action group editors, [Action Group Manager](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/61263-0-23-ActionGroupManager-%28AGM%29-1-3-2-0-%2829-01-2014%29-bugfixes) and [Actions on the fly](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24882-Actions-on-the-Fly-Edit-your-action-groups-in-flight-mode) (I personally preferred AGM as it had a nice UI).

Both plugins have been out of date for quite some time. and I have been unable to find any similar ones; so I'm hoping someone can make a new one, or even try to update one of these.

If there is a plugin like these which I wasn't able to find, can someone send me a link?
I also just noticed that AGM has in fact been recompiled, I seem to be missing a lot of things.
